scripts.electron:windows:mock: npm run build -- -c el-mock && electron-builder build --windows
scripts.electron:linux:mock: npm run build -- -c el-mock && electron-builder build --linux
scripts.electron:mac:mock: npm run build -- -c el-mock && electron-builder build --mac
scripts.electron:windows:local: npm run build -- -c el-local && electron-builder build --windows
scripts.electron:linux:local: npm run build -- -c el-local && electron-builder build --linux
scripts.electron:mac:local: npm run build -- -c el-local && electron-builder build --mac
scripts.electron:windows:dev: npm run build -- -c el-dev && electron-builder build --windows
scripts.electron:linux:dev: npm run build -- -c el-dev && electron-builder build --linux
scripts.electron:mac:dev: npm run build -- -c el-dev && electron-builder build --mac
scripts.electron:windows:test: npm run build -- -c el-test && electron-builder build --config electron-builder-test.json --c.extraMetadata.name=food-manager_testing --windows
scripts.electron:linux:test: npm run build -- -c el-test && electron-builder build --config electron-builder-test.json --c.extraMetadata.name=food-manager_testing --linux
scripts.electron:mac:test: npm run build -- -c el-test && electron-builder build --config electron-builder-test.json --c.extraMetadata.name=food-manager_testing --mac
scripts.electron:windows:staging: npm run build -- -c el-staging && electron-builder build --config electron-builder-staging.json --c.extraMetadata.name=food-manager_staging --windows
scripts.electron:linux:staging: npm run build -- -c el-staging && electron-builder build --config electron-builder-staging.json --c.extraMetadata.name=food-manager_staging --linux
scripts.electron:mac:staging: npm run build -- -c el-staging && electron-builder build --config electron-builder-staging.json --c.extraMetadata.name=food-manager_staging --mac
scripts.electron:windows:prod: npm run build -- -c el-production && electron-builder build --windows
scripts.electron:windows:prod:x32: npm run build -- -c el-production && electron-builder build --win --ia32
scripts.electron:linux:prod: npm run build -- -c el-production && electron-builder build --linux
scripts.electron:mac:prod: npm run build -- -c el-production && electron-builder build --mac
scripts.e2e: npm run build:web-dev && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT='e2e/tsconfig.e2e.json' mocha --timeout 300000 --require ts-node/register e2e/**/*.e2e.ts
scripts.electron:buildcheck:dev: npm run build -- -c el-buildcheck-dev && electron-builder build --windows
scripts.electron:buildcheck:mock: npm run build -- -c el-buildcheck-mock && electron-builder build --windows
scripts.electron:serve: wait-on http-get://localhost:4200/ && npm run electron:serve-tsc && electron . --serve
